messages.message: thanks @Xi Cheng - it's a "make kenny's life easier" thing, so it has no material impact to customers afaik :stuck_out_tongue:

Got it, thanks! Let us know if there's any possible things we can do to make the file system easier to use! :+1:
For some additional context, we are providing a distributed file system with multiple storage types (S3, NFS, AzureBlobStorage), and symlink is a tricky concept when building over these different layers since it is essentially a reference to any actual storage objects and it creates complexities when it comes to properly support it.
